Posts.EditableText:
I'm brand new to Quest, and I've done the tutorials.  However, I may be missing something.  I'm trying to write in an alias for my starting room, the Medical Bay.  I don't want it to show up at the beginning of the game, but it does anyways. 

Example:
You are in the Medical Bay. a Medical Bay.

 Not only this, but I can't leave the alias blank either. If I do that, the text that appears is "You are in the Medical Bay. a"
Any help is appreciated.

Posts.EditableText: MotherNight, can you please attach your aslx file? It looks like maybe you've got a prefix or something in there, but I'm not sure. Creativita, there is a giant "Read the tutorial" button the Edit tab in the Windows version, and the Help button on the web version leads you to a big Tutorial link... both of which point here: http://quest5.net/wiki/Tutorial
